snippet: With drug gangs looking to expand their operations, Argentina, a transit point in the 1990s, has turned into a profitable marketplace.
abstract: Argentina has turned into a profitable marketplace for drug gangs looking to expand their operations; there is a huge local demand for drugs, and unlike governments in some other countries in the region that are engaged in aggressive drug wars, the government has not yet aimed the full might of its military on traffickers.
lead_paragraph: With drug gangs looking to expand their operations, Argentina, a transit point in the 1990s, has turned into a profitable marketplace.

headline.seo: For Drug Traffickers, Argentina Has Become a Destination
headline.main: Once Just a Stopover for Drug Traffickers, Argentina Has Now Become a Destination
headline.print_headline: Once Just a Stopover for Drug Traffickers, Argentina Is Now Their Destination
